261963.content:
za ljude koji ne znaju kako početi uopće, a i za buduće generacije, evo par korisnih poveznica:

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/authentication/social/facebook-logins?view=aspnetcore-6.0 (za Facebook)

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/authentication/social/twitter-logins?view=aspnetcore-6.0 (za Twitter)

https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/authentication/social/?view=aspnetcore-6.0&tabs=visual-studio (otvaranje dotnet projekta u Visual Studiu)

https://www.roundthecode.com/dotnet/allow-your-users-to-login-to-your-asp-net-core-app-through-facebook (postavljanje svih potrebnih stvari unutar koda za Facebook prijavu, za Twitter nemam jer nisam koristio)
